title: 03/29/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/29/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin examines the 49ers trading up to get the number 3 overall pick in the draft and why they felt the pressure to make a big move only 2 seasons after playing in the Super Bowl. He also discusses USC’s dominating run to the Elite 8 and why they have a good chance to upset undefeated Gonzaga. Plus, NFL insider Peter Schrager joins the show to share the latest insight on which players are expected to be taken at the top of the draft next month. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
